tool_description: The Airdrop API provides information on upcoming, past and present token presales. It allows you to sort by filters, trends, profile tickers and more.
name: Airdrop
title: Airdrop

api_list.name: Airdrop - Trending
api_list.description: Returns some basic information about the all Trending airdrop.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zloadr-airdrop-v1.p.rapidapi.com/RapidAPI/airdrop/trending"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zloadr-airdrop-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Airdrop - Profile
api_list.description: Returns returns detailed information of the airdrop.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zloadr-airdrop-v1.p.rapidapi.com/RapidAPI/airdrop/Profile?name=BitEsprit"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zloadr-airdrop-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
